rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现青少年吸食大麻与精神疾病风险较高有关研究人员发现，青春期吸食大麻会显着增加患精神疾病的风险，但这种风险在成年初期并不显着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Adolescent-cannabis-use-linked-to-higher-risk-of-psychotic-disorders-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Adolescent-cannabis-use-linked-to-higher-risk-of-psychotic-disorders-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da76488-d285-4967-8667-2fbeafaafe3f Sun, 26 May 2024 21:34:00 -0400 Adolescent cannabis use linked to higher risk of psychotic disorders, study finds
研究发现人体虱子可以传播鼠疫细菌研究人员改造了一种人体虱子菌株来研究它们与鼠疫耶尔森氏菌的感染动态，发现虱子可以被感染并传播鼠疫细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds- human-body-lice-can-transmit-plague-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds- human-body-lice-can-transmit-plague-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=209dc023-636d-4522-bc0e-d01e15785fe1 Sun, 26 May 2024 21:19:00 -0400 Study finds human body lice can transmit plague bacteria
索马鲁肽增加非糖尿病肥胖患者勃起功能障碍的风险研究人员发现，用于非糖尿病肥胖男性减肥的索马鲁肽治疗会增加勃起功能障碍和睾酮缺乏的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Increased-risk-of-erectile-dysfunction-with-semaglutide-in-non-diabetic-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Increased-risk-of-erectile-dysfunction-with-semaglutide-in-non-diabetic-obese-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f78afa8-fad4-42e2-917f-1ed26e4aa3c4 Sun, 26 May 2024 21:08:00 -0400 Increased risk of erectile dysfunction with semaglutide in non-diabetic obese patients
研究发现，向上的社会经济流动性可降低痴呆症风险研究人员发现，一生中社会经济地位的向上转变会降低患痴呆症的风险并增加无痴呆期，而社会经济地位的向下转变会增加患痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Upward-socioeconomic-mobility-reduces-dementia-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Upward-socioeconomic-mobility-reduces-dementia-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7321c9e-7d48-4a4c-a07b-3e7eca561939 Sun, 26 May 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Upward socioeconomic mobility reduces dementia risk, study finds
研究发现因缺血性异常勃起住院的人数增加研究人员分析了德国的全国数据，以评估高流量和低流量阴茎异常勃起住院病例的趋势和结果，发现缺血性异常勃起住院病例增加，而与镰状细胞病相关的病例减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds-rise-in-hospitalizations-for-ischemic-priapism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds-rise-in-hospitalizations-for-ischemic-priapism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd0b099c-6548-4e84-a6a7-70de44d051e5 Sun, 26 May 2024 20:40:00 -0400 Study finds rise in hospitalizations for ischemic priapism
研究表明健康的植物性饮食可降低痛风风险，不健康的饮食会增加痛风风险研究人员发现，健康的植物性饮食可以降低痛风的风险，而不健康的植物性饮食会增加痛风的风险，尤其是女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-shows-healthy-plant-based-diets-lower-gout-risk-unhealthy-diets-raise-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-shows-healthy-plant-based-diets-lower-gout-risk-unhealthy-diets-raise-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192ffb56-cbdd-4b58-87fe-261699a7ac89 Sun, 26 May 2024 20:32:00 -0400 Study shows healthy plant-based diets lower gout risk, unhealthy diets raise it
研究表明孕妇的不同加德纳菌种类与较高的早产风险有关研究人员调查了孕妇阴道微生物组中加德纳菌的多样性，发现较高的加德纳菌丰富度与早产风险增加之间存在关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-links-diverse-Gardnerella-species-in-pregnant-women-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-links-diverse-Gardnerella-species-in-pregnant-women-to-higher-preterm-birth-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec3288b0-7d7e-4583-b35b-bf4fa693f7ab Sun, 26 May 2024 20:22:00 -0400 Study links diverse Gardnerella species in pregnant women to higher preterm birth risk
研究表明常见但被忽视的神秘体验会影响幸福感研究人员发现，冥想和正念等练习中出现的突发现象（EP）很常见，可以导致积极和消极的结果，这凸显了更好的临床支持的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-reveals-common-yet-overlooked-mystical-experiences-impact-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-reveals-common-yet-overlooked-mystical-experiences-impact-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca092cba-9b5a-4fd1-b799-55f168d3f5ad Sun, 26 May 2024 20:13:00 -0400 Study reveals common yet overlooked mystical experiences impact well-being
先进技术揭示了 plectasin 对细菌的类似尼龙搭扣的作用一种名为菌丝素的小型抗生素采用创新机制来杀死细菌。通过组装成大型结构，plectasin 锁定在细菌细胞表面的目标上，类似于 Velcro 两侧形成粘合的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240525/Advanced-techniques-reveal-plectasins-velcro-like-action-against-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240525/Advanced-techniques-reveal-plectasins-velcro-like-action-against-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be89ccc4-3c0e-4c51-baa9-3d1b45753504 Sat, 25 May 2024 00:18:08 -0400 Advanced techniques reveal plectasin's velcro-like action against bacteria
专家建议采用结构化方法来优化多发性硬化症康复中的运动干预多发性硬化症 (MS) 研究专家团队建议采用结构化方法来研究运动训练机制，以改善多发性硬化症 (MS) 的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Experts-recommend-structed-approach-to-optimize-exercise-interventions-in-MS-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240524/Experts-recommend-structed-approach-to-optimize-exercise-interventions-in-MS-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53baae79-6142-470b-baf5-9c9814d0fb05 Fri, 24 May 2024 13:58:00 -0400 Experts recommend structured approach to optimize exercise interventions in MS rehabilitation
